snippet.title: Pizza Kidd | Beat 'Em Up Demo & Gameplay Trailer | Kidd Games
snippet.description:
Play Our Demo: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/859318
PIZZA KIDD (ピザキッド) an all new, stylish, combat driven 2-D beat-em-up set in a dark sci-fantasy world—featuring uniquely drawn 16-bit pixel art with an aesthetic heavily inspired by 90's anime, graphic novels, and quarter munching arcade brawlers.
__
#wishlist on STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2105260/Pizza_Kidd
__
Early PK Test Demo — Gameplay Trailer 01
Play through with our developer RAGINGSLIME.
Early access DEMO is available for limited time...
—
Join the Pizza Kidd Game Discord Server for details:
https://discord.gg/v2uvZTbXdE
—
Team Pizza Kidd
Developed by:
© 2022 Kidd Games, LLC — PizzaKidd: The Game
www.pizzakidd.com
—
Twitter — @KiddPizza
#TEAMPIZZAKIDD
#PIZZAKIDD
